text: I am a Secondary 1 student and just graduated from this Primary school. Overall, the teachers here are super encouraging and nice and they don‚Äôt scold unreasonably. The canteen food is super nice also and I love it. I still miss the school.ü•≤I would totally recommend this school.

I am a sec 1 student now and I just graduated from QTPS. The teachers in this primary school is very kind and patient. They really played a big role in my primary school journey, making sure everyone understands before moving on. They will take the effort to know all our troubles and difficulties, letting us know that we are not alone. When I was in primary 6, they really stood by us and went the extra mile to help us. A big shout out to my favourite teacher Ms Ratna.
This school is the best I am a current student in Primary 4. The teachers are not unreasonable and do not scold us for  not doing our homework once. Definitely recommend this school.

I am a sec 1 student now and i just graduated from this primary school last year. From my experience, all of the teachers in this primary school are very patient during our learning journey especially towards the Primary Leaving School Examination(PSLE). They definitely played a big part in my primary school journey, making it memorable while making sure that every students strives to do their best in their exams, cca, etc. They will also take the initiative to help us with our troubles and difficulties, making sure that we can all feel safe in school. QTPS made me feel like i was home and the pupils there are also very sweet. Shout out to Ms Ratna and Ms Peck who made my journey towards CGS possible! I would definitely recommend children to join QTPS!
